column5: Make yourself at home in our clean, newly renovated, farmhouse-style home. Conveniently located and minutes away from Scott & White Hospital, McLane Children's Hospital, and Temple College. Seven miles from Mary Hardin Baylor. Also right down the street from great shopping + food options like Starbucks, Panera Bread, Freebirds, Jason's Deli, Mexican, and other dine-in restaurants. Enjoy a night of southern hospitality in a room with a brand new queen-size bed, and your own private bathroom.
column8: Private Bed & Bath in our Newly Renovated Home
